languages.text: "Кстати, мои ребята всем в Амасекусе уши прожужжали о том, что случилось в системе Райкад. И особенно красочно описывали встречу с добр{mf|ым|ой} господ{mf|ином|жой}, что не стала лишать их и без того потрепанной шкуры". {n}Ризза многозначительно и благодарно кивает.{/n} "Ни старая Ризза, ни ее друзья не забывают добра, можете поверить на слово".

"By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."
languages.original_text: "Кстати, мои ребята всем в Амасекусе уши прожужжали о том, что случилось в системе Райкад. И особенно красочно описывали встречу с добр{mf|ым|ой} господ{mf|ином|жой}, что не стала лишать их и без того потрепанной шкуры". {n}Ризза многозначительно и благодарно кивает.{/n} "Ни старая Ризза, ни ее друзья не забывают добра, можете поверить на слово".

"By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

"By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

"By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

languages.text: "Meine Jungs haben beim Amasec übrigens allen ins Ohr geflüstert, was im Rykad-System passiert ist. Und sie haben sich nicht zurückgehalten, als es um ihre Begegnung mit {mf|dem netten Lord|der netten Lady} ging, {mf|der|die} sie nicht um ihre letzten Habseligkeiten bringen wollte." {n}Ryzza nickt bedeutungsvoll und dankbar.{/n} "Die alte Ryzza vergisst keine Gefälligkeiten ... und ihre Freunde auch nicht ... ich gebe Euch mein Wort darauf."
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Jungs haben beim Amasec übrigens allen ins Ohr geflüstert, was im Rykad-System passiert ist. Und sie haben sich nicht zurückgehalten, als es um ihre Begegnung mit {mf|dem netten Lord|der netten Lady} ging, {mf|der|die} sie nicht um ihre letzten Habseligkeiten bringen wollte." {n}Ryzza nickt bedeutungsvoll und dankbar.{/n} "Die alte Ryzza vergisst keine Gefälligkeiten ... und ihre Freunde auch nicht ... ich gebe Euch mein Wort darauf."

languages.text: « À ce propos, mes gars ont crié sur tous les toits de l'Amasecus ce qui s'était passé dans le système de Rykad. Et ils se sont pas gênés pour raconter en détail leur rencontre avec {mf|le bon seigneur|la bonne dame} qu'a épargné leurs malheureuses carcasses, {n}dit-elle avec un hochement de tête entendu et reconnaissant.{/n} La vieille Ryzza, elle est pas du genre ingrat, et ses amis non plus, vous pouvez me croire sur parole. »
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: « À ce propos, mes gars ont crié sur tous les toits de l'Amasecus ce qui s'était passé dans le système de Rykad. Et ils se sont pas gênés pour raconter en détail leur rencontre avec {mf|le bon seigneur|la bonne dame} qu'a épargné leurs malheureuses carcasses, {n}dit-elle avec un hochement de tête entendu et reconnaissant.{/n} La vieille Ryzza, elle est pas du genre ingrat, et ses amis non plus, vous pouvez me croire sur parole. »

languages.text: «Por cierto, mis muchachos le han estado contando a todo el mundo del Amasecus lo que les pasó en el sistema Rykad. No paran de alabar la nobleza de{mf|l| la} noble que no les robó cuando atravesaban su peor momento», {n}Ryzza asiente con gratitud y entusiasmo.{/n} «La vieja Ryzza no olvida un favor, ni tampoco lo hacen sus amigos... de eso puede estar segur{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: «Por cierto, mis muchachos le han estado contando a todo el mundo del Amasecus lo que les pasó en el sistema Rykad. No paran de alabar la nobleza de{mf|l| la} noble que no les robó cuando atravesaban su peor momento», {n}Ryzza asiente con gratitud y entusiasmo.{/n} «La vieja Ryzza no olvida un favor, ni tampoco lo hacen sus amigos... de eso puede estar segur{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: “顺便一提，我的孩子们一直在烈酒修会唠叨个没完，对每个人说莱卡德发生的事情。而且，他们还提到了某位仁慈的大人，说这位大人完全没打算借着这个机会，对他们趁火打劫。”{n}莱萨意味深长地点了点头，充满了感激的意味。{/n}“老莱萨绝对不会忘记别人的恩情，她的朋友们也不会忘，我是说真的。”
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: “顺便一提，我的孩子们一直在烈酒修会唠叨个没完，对每个人说莱卡德发生的事情。而且，他们还提到了某位仁慈的大人，说这位大人完全没打算借着这个机会，对他们趁火打劫。”{n}莱萨意味深长地点了点头，充满了感激的意味。{/n}“老莱萨绝对不会忘记别人的恩情，她的朋友们也不会忘，我是说真的。”

languages.text: 「ところで、うちの子達がアマセッカスの皆に、ライカド星系で起きた事を噂してるんだよ。そしたらあの子達、ボロボロに痛めつけられたけど、とあるお優しい方が身包みは剥がなかったって、構わずベラベラ話していたわ」{n}リザは意味ありげに、感謝を込めて頭を下げる。{/n}「リザおばさんは親切な行いも、親切にしてくれた友人のことも忘れない。心得ておいて」
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: 「ところで、うちの子達がアマセッカスの皆に、ライカド星系で起きた事を噂してるんだよ。そしたらあの子達、ボロボロに痛めつけられたけど、とあるお優しい方が身包みは剥がなかったって、構わずベラベラ話していたわ」{n}リザは意味ありげに、感謝を込めて頭を下げる。{/n}「リザおばさんは親切な行いも、親切にしてくれた友人のことも忘れない。心得ておいて」

languages.text: "Bu arada benim oğlanlar Amasekus'ta herkesin kafasını şişirip Rykad Sistemi'nde olup bitenleri anlatıyor. Zaten hırpalanmışken daha fazla üstlerine gitmeyen nazik bir {mf|lordla|leydiyle} karşılaştıklarından bahsederken de en ufak bir ayrıntıyı olsun atlamadılar." {n}Ryzza, anlamlı ve minnet dolu bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Koca Ryzza da arkadaşları da yapılan kıyakları unutmaz... Sana bunun sözünü verebilirim."
languages.original_text: "By the way, my boys have been buzzing in everyone's ears at the Amasecus, telling them about what happened in the Rykad System. And they didn't hold back when it came to describing their encounter with the kind {mf|lord|lady} who wasn't about to rob them of their already battered hides." {n}Ryzza nods meaningfully and gratefully.{/n} "Old Ryzza doesn't forget a good turn, and neither do her friends — you can take my word for it."

traits.locale_text: "Bu arada benim oğlanlar Amasekus'ta herkesin kafasını şişirip Rykad Sistemi'nde olup bitenleri anlatıyor. Zaten hırpalanmışken daha fazla üstlerine gitmeyen nazik bir {mf|lordla|leydiyle} karşılaştıklarını anlatırken de en ufak bir ayrıntıyı olsun atlamadılar." {n}Ryzza, anlamlı ve minnet dolu bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Koca Ryzza da, arkadaşları da yapılan kıyakları unutmaz... Sana bunun sözünü verebilirim."
